original_text: Now even the first covenant had regulations for worship and an earthly place of holiness.
korean_text: 첫 언약에도 섬기는 예법과 세상에 속한 성소가 있더라

sentences.original_text: Now even the first covenant had regulations for worship
sentences.korean_translation: 첫 언약조차도 예배에 대한 규정을 가졌습니다

sentences.original_text: and an earthly place of holiness.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 땅에 있는 거룩한 곳이 있었습니다
